verses.verse: Then the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> Go<WH935> in to Pharaoh,<WH6547> and tell<WH1696> him, Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of the Hebrews,<WH5680> Let my people<WH5971> go,<WH7971> that they may serve<WH5647> me.
For if<WH518> you refuse<WH3986> to let them go,<WH7971> and will hold<WH2388> them still,<WH5750>

Behold,<WH2009> the hand<WH3027> of the LORD<WH3068> is on your cattle<WH4735> which<WH834> is in the field,<WH7704> on the horses,<WH5483> on the asses,<WH2543> on the camels,<WH1581> on the oxen,<WH1241> and on the sheep:<WH6629> there shall be a very<WH3966> grievous<WH3515> murrain.<WH1698>

And the LORD<WH3068> shall sever<WH6395> between<WH996> the cattle<WH4735> of Israel<WH3478> and the cattle<WH4735> of Egypt:<WH4714> and there shall nothing<WH3808> die<WH4191> of all<WH3605> that is the children's<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>
And the LORD<WH3068> appointed<WH7760> a set<WH4150> time, saying,<WH559> To morrow<WH4279> the LORD<WH3068> shall do<WH6213> this<WH2088> thing<WH1697> in the land.<WH776>

And the LORD<WH3068> did<WH6213> that thing<WH1697> on the morrow,<WH4283> and all<WH3605> the cattle<WH4735> of Egypt<WH4714> died:<WH4191> but of the cattle<WH4735> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> died<WH4191> not one.<WH259>

And Pharaoh<WH6547> sent,<WH7971> and, behold,<WH2009> there was not one<WH259> of the cattle<WH4735> of the Israelites<WH3478> dead.<WH4191> And the heart<WH3820> of Pharaoh<WH6547> was hardened,<WH3515> and he did not let the people<WH5971> go.<WH7971>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses<WH4872> and to Aaron,<WH175> Take<WH3947> to you handfuls<WH4393> <WH2651> of ashes<WH6368> of the furnace,<WH3536> and let Moses<WH4872> sprinkle<WH2236> it toward the heaven<WH8064> in the sight<WH5869> of Pharaoh.<WH6547>

And it shall become<WH1961> small dust<WH80> in all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> and shall be a boil<WH7822> breaking<WH6524> forth with blains<WH76> on man,<WH120> and on beast,<WH929> throughout all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

And they took<WH3947> ashes<WH6368> of the furnace,<WH3536> and stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> Pharaoh;<WH6547> and Moses<WH4872> sprinkled<WH2236> it up toward heaven;<WH8064> and it became<WH1961> a boil<WH7822> breaking<WH6524> forth with blains<WH76> on man,<WH120> and on beast.<WH929>

And the magicians<WH2748> could<WH3201> not stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> Moses<WH4872> because<WH6440> of the boils;<WH7822> for the boil<WH7822> was on the magicians,<WH2748> and on all<WH3605> the Egyptians.<WH4714>
And the LORD<WH3068> hardened<WH2388> the heart<WH3820> of Pharaoh,<WH6547> and he listened<WH8085> not to them; as the LORD<WH3068> had spoken<WH1696> to Moses.<WH4872>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> Rise<WH7925> up early<WH7925> in the morning,<WH1242> and stand<WH3320> before<WH6440> Pharaoh,<WH6547> and say<WH559> to him, Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of the Hebrews,<WH5680> Let my people<WH5971> go,<WH7971> that they may serve<WH5647> me.

For I will at this<WH2063> time<WH6471> send<WH7971> all<WH3605> my plagues<WH4046> on your heart,<WH3820> and on your servants,<WH5650> and on your people;<WH5971> that you may know<WH3045> that there is none<WH369> like<WH3644> me in all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>
For now<WH6258> I will stretch<WH7971> out my hand,<WH3027> that I may smite<WH5221> you and your people<WH5971> with pestilence;<WH1698> and you shall be cut<WH3582> off from the earth.<WH776>

And in very<WH199> deed<WH199> for this<WH2063> cause<WH5668> have I raised<WH5975> you up, for to show<WH7200> in you my power;<WH3581> and that my name<WH8034> may be declared<WH5608> throughout all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>
As yet<WH5750> exalt<WH5549> you yourself against my people,<WH5971> that you will not let them go?<WH7971>

Behold,<WH2005> to morrow<WH4279> about this time<WH6256> I will cause it to rain<WH4305> a very<WH3966> grievous<WH3515> hail,<WH1259> such<WH834> as has not been<WH1961> in Egypt<WH4714> since<WH4480> the foundation<WH3245> thereof even until<WH5704> now.<WH6258>

Send<WH7971> therefore now,<WH6258> and gather<WH5756> your cattle,<WH4735> and all<WH3605> that you have in the field;<WH7704> for on every<WH3605> man<WH120> and beast<WH929> which<WH834> shall be found<WH4672> in the field,<WH7704> and shall not be brought<WH622> home,<WH1004> the hail<WH1259> shall come<WH3381> down<WH3381> on them, and they shall die.<WH4191>
He that feared<WH3373> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> among the servants<WH5650> of Pharaoh<WH6547> made his servants<WH5650> and his cattle<WH4735> flee<WH5127> into<WH413> the houses:<WH1004>
And he that regarded<WH3820> not the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> left<WH5800> his servants<WH5650> and his cattle<WH4735> in the field.<WH7704>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> Stretch<WH5186> forth your hand<WH3027> toward<WH5921> heaven,<WH8064> that there may be hail<WH1259> in all the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> on man,<WH120> and on beast,<WH929> and on every<WH3605> herb<WH6212> of the field,<WH7704> throughout the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

And Moses<WH4872> stretched<WH5186> forth his rod<WH4294> toward<WH5921> heaven:<WH8064> and the LORD<WH3068> sent<WH5414> thunder<WH6963> and hail,<WH1259> and the fire<WH784> ran<WH1980> along on the ground;<WH776> and the LORD<WH3068> rained<WH4305> hail<WH1259> on the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

So there was hail,<WH1259> and fire<WH784> mingled<WH3947> with the hail,<WH1259> very<WH3966> grievous,<WH3515> such<WH834> as there was none<WH3808> like<WH3644> it in all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> since<WH227> it became<WH1961> a nation.<WH1471>

And the hail<WH1259> smote<WH5221> throughout all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> all<WH3605> that was in the field,<WH7704> both man<WH120> and beast;<WH929> and the hail<WH1259> smote<WH5221> every<WH3605> herb<WH6212> of the field,<WH7704> and broke<WH7665> every<WH3605> tree<WH6086> of the field.<WH7704>
Only<WH7535> in the land<WH776> of Goshen,<WH1657> where<WH834> <WH8033> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> were, was there no<WH3808> hail.<WH1259>

And Pharaoh<WH6547> sent,<WH7971> and called<WH7121> for Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> and said<WH559> to them, I have sinned<WH2398> this time:<WH6471> the LORD<WH3068> is righteous,<WH6662> and I and my people<WH5971> are wicked.<WH7563>

Entreat<WH6279> the LORD<WH3068> (for it is enough)<WH7227> that there be no<WH3808> more mighty<WH430> thunder<WH6963> and hail;<WH1259> and I will let you go,<WH7971> and you shall stay<WH5975> no<WH3808> longer.<WH3254>

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to him, As soon as I am gone<WH3318> out of the city,<WH5892> I will spread<WH6566> abroad<WH6566> my hands<WH3709> to the LORD;<WH3068> and the thunder<WH6963> shall cease,<WH2308> neither<WH3808> shall there be any<WH5750> more<WH5750> hail;<WH1259> that you may know<WH3045> how that the earth<WH776> is the LORD's.<WH3068>
But as for you and your servants,<WH5650> I know<WH3045> that you will not yet<WH2962> fear<WH3372> the LORD<WH3068> God.<WH430>
And the flax<WH6594> and the barley<WH8184> was smitten:<WH5221> for the barley<WH8184> was in the ear,<WH24> and the flax<WH6594> was in bloom.<WH1392>
But the wheat<WH2406> and the rye<WH3698> were not smitten:<WH5221> for they were not grown<WH648> up.

And Moses<WH4872> went<WH3318> out of the city<WH5892> from Pharaoh,<WH6547> and spread<WH6566> abroad<WH6566> his hands<WH3709> to the LORD:<WH3068> and the thunders<WH6963> and hail<WH1259> ceased,<WH2308> and the rain<WH4306> was not poured<WH5413> on the earth.<WH776>

And when Pharaoh<WH6547> saw<WH7200> that the rain<WH4306> and the hail<WH1259> and the thunders<WH6963> were ceased,<WH2308> he sinned<WH2398> yet more,<WH3254> and hardened<WH3513> his heart,<WH3820> he and his servants.<WH5650>
And the heart<WH3820> of Pharaoh<WH6547> was hardened,<WH2388> neither<WH3808> would he let the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> go;<WH7971> as the LORD<WH3068> had spoken<WH1696> by Moses.<WH4872>
